sentence: But despite the missing call records, the Jan. 6 committee has reportedly unearthed information on at least one of Trump’s most highly scrutinized calls: A call between him and Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH).
author: Matt Shuham
title: Report: Jan. 6 Panel Finds Holes In Trump’s Official Call Logs On Day Of Insurrection

sentence: Trump reportedly spoke with several members of Congress on January 6, 2021, including Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio), Sen. Tommy Tuberville (R-Ala.) and House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.), whose call turned into a screaming match as McCarthy demanded that Trump condemn the rioters.
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Jan. 6 Committee Reportedly Finds Sparse White House Records Of Trump Calls On Day Of Riot

sentence: "I mean, I talked to Kevin McCarthy, I have talked to Jim Jordan and I have talked to other members who were speaking to the president, the former president that day," he reported.
author: Tom Boggioni
title: Here's why Trump may be headed for a 'criminal referral'

sentence: The "Take Back Congress Candidate Forum” will be littered with 10 congressional Trump acolytes like Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio and 13 hopefuls such as United States Senate candidate Herschel Walker of Georgia.
author: Brandon Gage
title: Donald Trump to host ‘Magapalooza’ at Mar-a-Lago on Wednesday

Jim Jordan (right) +6 View gallery Another image showed a donor (right) with former acting Attorney General Matthew Whitaker (left) Another photo from the event appears to show a GOP donor alongside former Acting Attorney General Matthew Whitaker.
author: Elizabeth Elkind
title: Trump meets Ted Cruz at Mar-a-Lago ahead of C-PAC: Republicans and conservative donors mingle at private Florida private club ahead of ex-President's prime-time Saturday night speech

title: Leaning on her Trump ties, Elise Stefanik plots future inside House GOP

sentence: He said he spoke to House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy, Rep. Jim Jordan and others, but maintained he did not destroy any records or use other phones.
author: Marita Vlachou
title: Trump Regrets Not Marching To Capitol On Jan. 6, Blames Pelosi For Violence
